attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!😡😡
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. When the music started playing rats gathered in the rat king so that he’s going to kill my dog. Now I love my dog so much but I cannot put up a fight with the rat king because he’s the most powerful leader ever. Then, everyone of my family started praising him and then they turned into rats🐀 . So now I don’t have a family anymore and I cry all the time when I look at my rat family.

attributes.title: DISGUSTED/Angry/HUNGRY!!!
attributes.review: Donald 🙈 oh Donald🍊 No.❤️ I’ll say it again for you....no. ❤️ this has been the 4,000,000,000th time that I have been seeing this ugly...disappointing, annoying, cold-blooded, racist, ped0, Sour, disgusting Orange..aka. D-d-o😥 D-d-o-n 🥴 D-d-on-a🤢 DonAlD🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮 Trumpet.😳 every time I see that disgusting thing, I puke. 🤭🤢 This is really hard for me. It’s a big no.❤️ for me. ❤️ And for my lovely, Generation Z members. ❤️ oh and it’s a big no, for everyone else. ❤️ I feel so bad for the Cheetos, that loves that pedo. 😥😬 aka..the boomers 🤢🤮.

attributes.title: Do not download!!
attributes.review:
I was trying to download the app to show support for my AMAZING president but unfortunately it took a whole WEEK to download!! I was connected to the internet and everything. Also as soon as I downloaded the app so much went wrong!! My Trump fence went missing and then my DOG DIED😢. I show
Nothing but unconditional love for MY president but this app is cursed 😥 I will continue to support MY president Daddy Trump. Don’t forget Trump 2020🇺🇸

attributes.title: this game is terrible
attributes.review: it took me 9 days to download and i couldn’t do anything while i was waiting, and when i went on the app there was spiders all over the screen!! not only on the game but also on  phone itself!!! that’s outrageous i can’t believe they put a Cheeto on my screen instead of our orange president. It didn’t even let me play roblox on the app this app is horrible!!!!

attributes.title: ugh this app where do i start
attributes.review: it took 2 months !!! to just DOWNLOAD IT 😤😡 after that long two months of waiting i finally opened the app and it restarted my whole phone i lost EVERYTHING my pictures my contacts EVERYTHING 0/10 recommended i think the gov hacked into my phone and erased everything but i was just trying to show my support to the orange dude and it did that DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT NEED TO BE TAKEN DOWN 😍😍😍😍

attributes.title: Please don’t get this app
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch like crazy and overall when I did get it to work, the layout was horrible and it was extremely hard to navigate. I kept getting pop ups on my phone, my phone would shut completely off and I wouldn’t be able to turn it back on for at least a couple of hours. Please DONT GET THIS APP!

attributes.title: Disappointed ✨🧚‍♂️ but listen to sweet night by bts🥰
attributes.review:
On my pillow
Can't get me tired
Sharing my fragile truth
That I still hope the door is open
'Cause the window
Opened one time with you and me
Now my forever's falling down
Wondering if you'd want me now
How could I know
One day I'd wake up feeling more
But I had already reached the shore
Guess we were ships in the night
Night, night
Hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo
Hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo
We were ships in the night, night, night
I'm wondering
Are you my best friend
Feel's like a river's rushing through my mind
I wanna ask you
If this is all just in my head
My heart is pounding tonight
I wonder
If you
Are too good to be true
And would it be alright if I
Pulled you closer…

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I never rate apps, but this one was a true disappointment and I don’t want my fellow patriotic Americans to go through what I went through. This app needs a lot more work. It took 3 days to download, and during that time, I had to endure the beeping noise it made while downloading. I was very concerned. But after those 3 gruesome days, I was able to rid my phone of this monstrosity.

attributes.title: All these reviews are fake
attributes.review: The app took 30 seconds to download and works fine. The bad reviews are from the liberal tiktok trying to get the app taken down.
